# Scent (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a sprinkle of mustard and pepper)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 180

*At your touch, the creature inhales deeply, experiencing a new world of sensory input.*

You give the creature touched the [[S3.1R-S - Universal Monster Rules R-S (Bestiary 6 Apx)|scent]] ability.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 2, Wizard 2 to Level per Savage Species and Serpent Kingdoms.

*House Rule:* Added Assassin 2 to Level.
